entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 15.

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 20.
